body: I bought Gold yesterday. When will I get it?
body_tagged: I bought Gold yesterday. When will I get it?
title: Rank?

replies.body: It can take up to 48 hours, give it some time. If it does not come in 48 hours, email support@avicus.net to tell the story to funkystudios.
replies.body_tagged: It can take up to 48 hours, give it some time. If it does not come in 48 hours, email support@avicus.net to tell the story to funkystudios.

replies.body:
Be pantient and you will get it eventually.
If you don't get your rank within 48 hours, email support@avicus.net with proof.
replies.body_tagged:
Be pantient and you will get it eventually.
If you don't get your rank within 48 hours, email support@avicus.net with proof.

replies.body: Ok. Some servers I've played on give you them within a matter of minutes.
replies.body_tagged: Ok. Some servers I've played on give you them within a matter of minutes.

replies.body: When I donated, before I get in the Staff Team, I got my rank in a few seconds. I really don't know why so many people get this problem, but I can gurantee that you will get your rank! :)
replies.body_tagged: When I donated, before I get in the Staff Team, I got my rank in a few seconds. I really don't know why so many people get this problem, but I can gurantee that you will get your rank! :)
